annotations.annotation: § 901 of D.C. Law 21-125 (June 30, 2016) provided that the change made to this section by § 202 of D.C. Law 21-125 (June 30, 2016) is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.

§ 901 of D.C. Law 21-125 (June 30, 2016) provided that the change made to this section by § 203 of D.C. Law 21-125 (June 30, 2016) is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.

§ 901 of D.C. Law 21-125 (June 30, 2016) provided that the change made to this section by § 204 of D.C. Law 21-125 (June 30, 2016) is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.
